articles.author: Hilary Whiteman
articles.title: US tourist filmed running off with baby wombat may have visa canceled, official says - CNN
articles.description: An American tourist who was reportedly filmed picking up and running off with a wild baby wombat may be forced to leave Australia if officials reviewing her visa find she has breached its conditions.
articles.content: An American tourist who was reportedly filmed picking up and running off with a wild baby wombat may be forced to leave Australia if officials reviewing her visa find she has breached its conditions.… [+4675 chars]
